verses.text: I will \w extol|strong="H7311"\w* thee, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; and I will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

Every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee; and I will \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*; and his \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w* \add is\add* \w unsearchable|strong="H2714"\w*.\f + \fr 145.3 \ft and his…: Heb. and of his greatness there is no search\f*

\w One|strong="H1755"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H7623"\w* thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w* to another, and shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* thy mighty \w acts|strong="H1369"\w*.

I will \w speak|strong="H7878"\w* of the \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w honour|strong="H1926"\w* of thy \w majesty|strong="H1935"\w*, and of thy \w wondrous|strong="H6381"\w* \w works|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 145.5 \ft works: Heb. things, or, words\f*

And \add men\add* shall \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* of the \w might|strong="H5807"\w* of thy terrible \w acts|strong="H3372"\w*: and I will \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* thy \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*.\f + \fr 145.6 \ft declare: Heb. declare it\f*

They shall abundantly \w utter|strong="H5042"\w* the \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* of thy \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w*, and shall \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* of thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, and full of \w compassion|strong="H7349"\w*; \w slow|strong="H0750"\w* to \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.\f + \fr 145.8 \ft of great…: Heb. great in mercy\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to all: and his tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \add are\add* over all his \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.
All thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and thy \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.
They shall \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* of the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* of thy \w power|strong="H1369"\w*;

To make \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* his mighty \w acts|strong="H1369"\w*, and the \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* of his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.

Thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \add is\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, and thy \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w* \add endureth\add* throughout \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 145.13 \ft an…: Heb. a kingdom of all ages\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w upholdeth|strong="H5564"\w* all that \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and raiseth \w up|strong="H2210"\w* all \add those that be\add* bowed \w down|strong="H3721"\w*.

The \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w wait|strong="H7663"\w* upon thee; and thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* them their \w meat|strong="H0400"\w* in due \w season|strong="H6256"\w*.\f + \fr 145.15 \ft wait…: or, look unto\f*
Thou \w openest|strong="H6605"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w satisfiest|strong="H7646"\w* the \w desire|strong="H7522"\w* of every living \w thing|strong="H2416"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* in all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w holy|strong="H2623"\w* in all his \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.\f + \fr 145.17 \ft holy: or, merciful, or, bountiful\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w nigh|strong="H7138"\w* unto all them that \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon him, to all that \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon him in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

He will \w fulfil|strong="H6213"\w* the \w desire|strong="H7522"\w* of them that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* him: he also will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* their \w cry|strong="H7775"\w*, and will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* them.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* all them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him: but all the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* will he \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w*.

My \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* the \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and let all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.
